description:
Put your bibs on and let the powder feast begin. When winter storm cycles are dropping a few centimeters an hour, you take full advantage. The Couloir Gore-Tex Bib Pants offer serious protection in unrelenting mountain conditions. The supple GORE-TEX® fabric offers freedom to move and the strategically placed pocket gives you access to essentials like heat packs and spare gloves. Integrated gaiters keep the pow out and long side vents let you dump heat on the skin track. A side-entry zipper extends from bib top to knee for easy on and off.

  • 3-layer recycled nylon with a GORE-TEX® membrane and DWR finish for superior waterproofness and breathability
  • GORE-TEX C-Knit™ lining slides easily over other layers and reduces weight while adding breathability
  • Fully seam-taped construction keeps you dry in howling conditions
  • Left vent with double zipper extends to the top of the bib for side entry
  • Adjustable suspenders fine tune the fit
  • Gusseted crotch, articulated knees and patterning ensure unrestricted movement
  • Side vents let you dump heat on the skin track
  • Two zippered thigh pockets and secure chest pocket for essentials
  • Side leg zippers are easy to put on over ski or snowboard boots and internal gaiters keep snow out
  • Reinforced kick patches protect against damage from boots, crampons and ski edges
  • Built-in Recco® Rescue System reflector allows ski patrol and mountain rescue teams to detect and locate it under snow
  • Pairs perfectly with the Couloir Gore-Tex Jacket for a backcountry-ready system
name: MEC Couloir Gore-Tex Bib Pants - Women's
